snp3.10:657: "Purisassa hi jātassa,kuṭhārī jāyate mukhe;Yāya chindati attānaṁ,bālo dubbhāsitaṁ bhaṇaṁ.
snp3.10:658: Yo nindiyaṁ pasaṁsati,Taṁ vā nindati yo pasaṁsiyo;Vicināti mukhena so kaliṁ,Kalinā tena sukhaṁ na vindati.
snp3.10:659: Appamatto ayaṁ kali,Yo akkhesu dhanaparājayo;Sabbassāpi sahāpi attanā,Ayameva mahattaro kali;Yo sugatesu manaṁ padosaye.
snp3.10:660: Sataṁ sahassānaṁ nirabbudānaṁ,Chattiṁsati pañca ca abbudāni;Yamariyagarahī nirayaṁ upeti,Vācaṁ manañca paṇidhāya pāpakaṁ.
snp3.10:661: Abhūtavādī nirayaṁ upeti,Yo vāpi katvā na karomicāha;Ubhopi te pecca samā bhavanti,Nihīnakammā manujā parattha.
snp3.10:662: Yo appaduṭṭhassa narassa dussati,Suddhassa posassa anaṅgaṇassa;Tameva bālaṁ pacceti pāpaṁ,Sukhumo rajo paṭivātaṁva khitto.
snp3.10:663: Yo lobhaguṇe anuyutto,So vacasā paribhāsati aññe;Asaddho kadariyo avadaññū,Macchari pesuṇiyaṁ anuyutto.
snp3.10:664: Mukhadugga vibhūta anariya,Bhūnahu pāpaka dukkaṭakāri;Purisanta kalī avajāta,Mā bahubhāṇidha nerayikosi.
snp3.10:665: Rajamākirasī ahitāya,Sante garahasi kibbisakārī;Bahūni duccaritāni caritvā,Gacchasi kho papataṁ cirarattaṁ.
snp3.10:666: Na hi nassati kassaci kammaṁ,Eti hataṁ labhateva suvāmi;Dukkhaṁ mando paraloke,Attani passati kibbisakārī.
snp3.10:668: Na hi vaggu vadanti vadantā,Nābhijavanti na tāṇamupenti;Aṅgāre santhate sayanti,Ginisampajjalitaṁ pavisanti.
snp3.10:669: Jālena ca onahiyāna,Tattha hananti ayomayakuṭebhi;Andhaṁva timisamāyanti,Taṁ vitatañhi yathā mahikāyo.
snp3.10:670: Atha lohamayaṁ pana kumbhiṁ,Ginisampajjalitaṁ pavisanti;Paccanti hi tāsu cirarattaṁ,Agginisamāsu samuppilavāte.
snp3.10:671: Atha pubbalohitamisse,Tattha kiṁ paccati kibbisakārī;Yaṁ yaṁ disakaṁ adhiseti,Tattha kilissati samphusamāno.
snp3.10:672: Puḷavāvasathe salilasmiṁ,Tattha kiṁ paccati kibbisakārī;Gantuṁ na hi tīramapatthi,Sabbasamā hi samantakapallā.
snp3.10:673: Asipattavanaṁ pana tiṇhaṁ,Taṁ pavisanti samucchidagattā;Jivhaṁ balisena gahetvā,Ārajayārajayā vihananti.
snp3.10:674: Atha vetaraṇiṁ pana duggaṁ,Tiṇhadhārakhuradhāramupenti;Tattha mandā papatanti,Pāpakarā pāpāni karitvā.
snp3.10:675: Khādanti hi tattha rudante,Sāmā sabalā kākolagaṇā ca;Soṇā siṅgālā paṭigiddhā,Kulalā vāyasā ca vitudanti.
snp3.10:676: Kicchā vatayaṁ idha vutti,Yaṁ jano phusati kibbisakārī;Tasmā idha jīvitasese,Kiccakaro siyā naro na cappamajje.
snp3.10:677: Te gaṇitā vidūhi tilavāhā,Ye padume niraye upanītā;Nahutāni hi koṭiyo pañca bhavanti,Dvādasa koṭisatāni punaññā.
snp3.10:678: Yāva dukhā nirayā idha vuttā,Tatthapi tāva ciraṁ vasitabbaṁ;Tasmā sucipesalasādhuguṇesu,Vācaṁ manaṁ satataṁ parirakkhe"ti.
